frontmatter.title: CivicActions Joins Digital Services Coalition
frontmatter.link_text: Digital Services Coalition Works to Deliver IT in a New Way to the Federal Government

node.html: CivicActions is among sixteen companies that have launched a coalition to bring innovation and agility to government IT contracting by transforming the working relationship between government and the private sector.

frontmatter.title: Senior Strategist at CivicActions Says Remote Teams Offer Competitive Advantage
frontmatter.link_text: Keep Your IT Competitive With Distributed Teams

node.html: InformationWeek interviewed CivicActions Senior Strategist John O’Duinn, a technology veteran and expert on distributed teams, to learn how tech companies can attract the best talent and gain a competitive advantage through remote-friendly policies.

frontmatter.title: CivicActions Named to 2019 GovTech 100 Top Government Technology Companies List

node.html: For the third year in a row, we’re thrilled to earn a spot on this prestigious list of companies working to bring modern technologies, innovative culture, and better public services to state and local governments.

frontmatter.title: CivicActions Featured on List of World-Changing Drupal Websites
frontmatter.link_text: 9 Drupal Websites That Change the World

node.html: A list by SooperThemes highlights the use of Drupal by organizations focused on positive world impact. We were honored to work on 2 of the 9 sites - Tesla Motors and Doctors Without Borders.

frontmatter.title: New York City Delivers Real-Time Data to Metro Riders Using Drupal 8 and Amazon's IoT
frontmatter.link_text: Using Drupal 8 and AWS IoT To Power Digital Signage for New York's Subway System

node.html: Acquia and CivicActions worked together using innovative technology combinations to help New York City’s MTA provide digital signage with real-time data from the city’s massive network of tracks and stations, helping riders stay updated and get there on time.
